Class Contact

    Methods used to manage your Contacts.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public String add(String publicAccountID,
                  String email,
                  String[] publicListID,
                  String[] listName,
                  String title,
                  String firstName,
                  String lastName,
                  String phone,
                  String mobileNumber,
                  String notes,
                  String gender,
                  Date birthDate,
                  String city,
                  String state,
                  String postalCode,
                  String country,
                  String organizationName,
                  String website,
                  int annualRevenue,
                  String industry,
                  int numberOfEmployees,
                  ApiTypes.ContactSource source,
                  String returnUrl,
                  String sourceUrl,
                  String activationReturnUrl,
                  String activationTemplate,
                  Boolean sendActivation,
                  Date consentDate,
                  String consentIP,
                  HashMap<String,String> field,
                  String notifyEmail)
           throws Exception
        Add a new contact and optionally to one of your lists. Note that your API KEY is not required for this call.
        Parameters:
        publicAccountID - Public key for limited access to your account such as contact/add so you can use it safely on public websites.
        email - Proper email address.
        publicListID - ID code of list
        listName - Name of your list.
        title - Title
        firstName - First name.
        lastName - Last name.
        phone - Phone number
        mobileNumber - Mobile phone number
        notes - Free form field of notes
        gender - Your gender
        birthDate - Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format
        city - City.
        state - State or province.
        postalCode - Zip/postal code.
        country - Name of country.
        organizationName - Name of organization
        website - HTTP address of your website.
        annualRevenue - Annual revenue of contact
        industry - Industry contact works in
        numberOfEmployees - Number of employees
        source - Specifies the way of uploading the contact
        returnUrl - URL to navigate to after account creation
        sourceUrl - URL from which request was sent.
        activationReturnUrl - The url to return the contact to after activation.
        activationTemplate -
        sendActivation - True, if you want to send activation email to this account. Otherwise, false
        consentDate - Date of consent to send this contact(s) your email. If not provided current date is used for consent.
        consentIP - IP address of consent to send this contact(s) your email. If not provided your current public IP address is used for consent.
        field - Custom contact field like firstname, lastname, city etc. Request parameters prefixed by field_ like field_firstname, field_lastname
        notifyEmail - Emails, separated by semicolon, to which the notification about contact subscribing should be sent to
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        Exception

      • addBlocked

        public void addBlocked(String email,
                       ApiTypes.ContactStatus status)
                throws Exception
        Manually add or update a contacts status to Abuse, Bounced or Unsubscribed status (blocked).
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        email - Proper email address.
        status - Name of status: Active, Engaged, Inactive, Abuse, Bounced, Unsubscribed.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • changeProperty

        public void changeProperty(String email,
                           String name,
                           String value)
                    throws Exception
        Change any property on the contact record.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        email - Proper email address.
        name - Name of the contact property you want to change.
        value - Value you would like to change the contact property to.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • changeStatus

        public void changeStatus(ApiTypes.ContactStatus status,
                         String rule,
                         ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
                         Boolean allContacts)
                  throws Exception
        Changes status of selected Contacts. You may provide RULE for selection or specify list of Contact IDs.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        status - Name of status: Active, Engaged, Inactive, Abuse, Bounced, Unsubscribed.
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • countByStatus

        public ApiTypes.ContactStatusCounts countByStatus(String rule,
                                                  Boolean allContacts)
                                           throws Exception
        Returns number of Contacts, RULE specifies contact Status.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ContactStatusCounts
        Throws:
        Exception

      • delete

        public void delete(String rule,
                   ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
                   Boolean allContacts)
            throws Exception
        Permanantly deletes the contacts provided. You can provide either a qualified rule or a list of emails (comma separated string).
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        Throws:
        Exception

      • export

        public ApiTypes.ExportLink export(ApiTypes.ExportFileFormats fileFormat,
                                  String rule,
                                  ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
                                  Boolean allContacts,
                                  ApiTypes.CompressionFormat compressionFormat,
                                  String fileName)
                           throws Exception
        Export selected Contacts to JSON.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        fileFormat - Format of the exported file
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        compressionFormat - FileResponse compression format. None or Zip.
        fileName - Name of your file.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ExportLink
        Throws:
        Exception

      • list

        public ApiTypes.ContactArray list(String rule,
                                  Boolean allContacts,
                                  int limit,
                                  int offset)
                           throws Exception
        List of all contacts. If you have not specified RULE, all Contacts will be listed.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        rule - Query used for filtering.
        allContacts - True: Include every Contact in your Account. Otherwise, false
        limit - Maximum of loaded items.
        offset - How many items should be loaded ahead.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.ContactArray
        Throws:
        Exception

                                                String search,
                                                int limit,
                                                int offset)
                                         throws Exception
        Load blocked contacts
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        statuses - List of blocked statuses: Abuse, Bounced or Unsubscribed
        search - Text fragment used for searching.
        limit - Maximum of loaded items.
        offset - How many items should be loaded ahead.
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.BlockedContactArray
        Throws:
        Exception

      • quickAdd

        public void quickAdd(ApiTypes.StringArray emails,
                     String firstName,
                     String lastName,
                     String title,
                     String organization,
                     String industry,
                     String city,
                     String country,
                     String state,
                     String zip,
                     String publicListID,
                     String listName,
                     ApiTypes.ContactStatus status,
                     String notes,
                     Date consentDate,
                     String consentIP,
                     String notifyEmail)
              throws Exception
        Add new Contact to one of your Lists.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        emails - Comma delimited list of contact emails
        firstName - First name.
        lastName - Last name.
        title - Title
        organization - Name of organization
        industry - Industry contact works in
        city - City.
        country - Name of country.
        state - State or province.
        zip - Zip/postal code.
        publicListID - ID code of list
        listName - Name of your list.
        status - Name of status: Active, Engaged, Inactive, Abuse, Bounced, Unsubscribed.
        notes - Free form field of notes
        consentDate - Date of consent to send this contact(s) your email. If not provided current date is used for consent.
        consentIP - IP address of consent to send this contact(s) your email. If not provided your current public IP address is used for consent.
        notifyEmail - Emails, separated by semicolon, to which the notification about contact subscribing should be sent to
        Throws:
        Exception

      • subscribe

        public String subscribe(String publicAccountID)
                 throws Exception
        Basic double opt-in email subscribe form for your account. This can be used for contacts that need to re-subscribe as well.
        Parameters:
        publicAccountID - Public key for limited access to your account such as contact/add so you can use it safely on public websites.
        Returns:
        String
        Throws:
        Exception

      • update

        public ApiTypes.Contact update(String email,
                               String firstName,
                               String lastName,
                               String organizationName,
                               String title,
                               String city,
                               String state,
                               String country,
                               String zip,
                               String birthDate,
                               String gender,
                               String phone,
                               Boolean activate,
                               String industry,
                               int numberOfEmployees,
                               String annualRevenue,
                               int purchaseCount,
                               String firstPurchase,
                               String lastPurchase,
                               String notes,
                               String websiteUrl,
                               String mobileNumber,
                               String faxNumber,
                               String linkedInBio,
                               int linkedInConnections,
                               String twitterBio,
                               String twitterUsername,
                               String twitterProfilePhoto,
                               int twitterFollowerCount,
                               int pageViews,
                               int visits,
                               Boolean clearRestOfFields,
                               HashMap<String,String> field)
                        throws Exception
        Update selected contact. Omitted contact's fields will be reset by default (see the clearRestOfFields parameter)
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        email - Proper email address.
        firstName - First name.
        lastName - Last name.
        organizationName - Name of organization
        title - Title
        city - City.
        state - State or province.
        country - Name of country.
        zip - Zip/postal code.
        birthDate - Date of birth in YYYY-MM-DD format
        gender - Your gender
        phone - Phone number
        activate - True, if Contact should be activated. Otherwise, false
        industry - Industry contact works in
        numberOfEmployees - Number of employees
        annualRevenue - Annual revenue of contact
        purchaseCount - Number of purchases contact has made
        firstPurchase - Date of first purchase in YYYY-MM-DD format
        lastPurchase - Date of last purchase in YYYY-MM-DD format
        notes - Free form field of notes
        websiteUrl - Website of contact
        mobileNumber - Mobile phone number
        faxNumber - Fax number
        linkedInBio - Biography for Linked-In
        linkedInConnections - Number of Linked-In connections
        twitterBio - Biography for Twitter
        twitterUsername - User name for Twitter
        twitterProfilePhoto - URL for Twitter photo
        twitterFollowerCount - Number of Twitter followers
        pageViews - Number of page views
        visits - Number of website visits
        clearRestOfFields - States if the fields that were omitted in this request are to be reset or should they be left with their current value
        field - Custom contact field like firstname, lastname, city etc. Request parameters prefixed by field_ like field_firstname, field_lastname
        Returns:
        ApiTypes.Contact
        Throws:
        Exception

      • upload

        public int upload(FileData contactFile,
                  Boolean allowUnsubscribe,
                  int listID,
                  String listName,
                  ApiTypes.ContactStatus status,
                  Date consentDate,
                  String consentIP)
           throws Exception
        Upload contacts in CSV file.
        Parameters:
        apikey - ApiKey that gives you access to our SMTP and HTTP API's.
        contactFile - Name of CSV file with Contacts.
        allowUnsubscribe - True: Allow unsubscribing from this (optional) newly created list. Otherwise, false
        listID - ID number of selected list.
        listName - Name of your list to upload contacts to, or how the new, automatically created list should be named
        status - Name of status: Active, Engaged, Inactive, Abuse, Bounced, Unsubscribed.
        consentDate - Date of consent to send this contact(s) your email. If not provided current date is used for consent.
        consentIP - IP address of consent to send this contact(s) your email. If not provided your current public IP address is used for consent.
        Returns:
        int
        Throws:
        Exception
